context.text: List of Virtual Console games (Europe) - Wikipedia, the free encyclopedia
Title Developer Release Date PEGI PAL conversion issues
There are currently 55 games available to purchase.
[ edit ] Nintendo Entertainment System (500 Wii points)
[ edit ] Super Nintendo Entertainment System (800 Wii points)

Notes: The PEGI (Pan European Game Information) ratings displayed here are based on the rating information on the PEGI website . Most European countries use this rating, however, Portugal has minor deviations in the age ratings. In the Developer column, the company who originally developed the game is listed, not the company who put the game on Virtual Console.

The "PAL Conversion Issues" column indicates whether the title is known to suffer from currently unaddressed NTSC to PAL conversion problems (see issues regarding PAL Wii systems). Games with "Some" have had the borders reduced, and while the gameplay runs at a slower speed than their NTSC version, the music has been sped up to play correctly. All SNES and all 1st party NES games fit in this category.
There are currently 28 games available to purchase.

The following is the complete list of the Virtual Console titles available for the Wii in Europe as shown within the Virtual Console section of the Wii Shop Channel . There are currently 227 games available to purchase and 1 retired game (no longer available to purchase).
There are currently 14 games available to purchase.
